title: Modern Art Quilts - Design, Fuse and Quilt-As-You-Go (gnv64)
description: Modern Art Quilts: Design, Fuse & Quilt-As-You-Go By Sue Bleiweiss C&T Publishing/Stash Books | November 2018 | ISBN: 9781617456817 | True PDF | 116 Pages | 30.3 mb Create dynamic quilts the fast and easy way, with no piecing required. Learn the principles of design to create your own modern quilts, with an intro to fusible fabric art and seven satisfying projects to help you realize the freedom of fusing. Get tips on dyeing your own gorgeous fabrics and try a new way to quilt as-you-go for a faster and more beautiful finish. If you can imagine it, you can quilt it! About the Author https://i.postimg.cc/Kzmk72gF/Sue-Bleiweiss.jpg Sue Bleiweiss is an award-winning fiber artist. Widely recognized for her whimsical imagery and bold, saturated quilts, she loves to teach in person and online. She lives in Massachusetts where she spends her weekends hiking or canoeing with her husband. http://www.suebleiweiss.com/ CONTENTS Introduction 6 Art and Design 8 Elements of Design 10 Principles of Design 11 Design Exercises 16 Finding Inspiration 18 Tools and Materials 32 Essential Techniques 38 Putting It All Together 48 Projects Party Lights 50 Hexi Network 54 Waves 60 Stacks of Three 66 Going in Circles 72 Inside Out 78 Flower Power 86 What’s Next? 96 Critique, Learn, and Develop Your Personal Style 96 Writing an Artist Statement 100 Appendix: Easy Fabric Dyeing 104 About the Author 111 https://i.postimg.cc/g2yTSVTp/1.jpg https://i.postimg.cc/cCqzkF0s/2.jpg
